summary: A growing collection of lorefriendly armors.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp350/bamsemisbruker/Untitled-1_zpsb0e498a5.jpg[/IMG]
Some of you might have followed my blog: Note that all the armors there will EVENTUALLY be added to this mod. 

If anyone has got the same skills as Fenriks and want to speed up the importing prossess, you are free to join! Just PM me and you will receive the blenderfiles. 

_________________________________

[youtube]bceUW6eMXu4[/youtube]

Details:
All the armors are ONLY craftable. Armors might be added to the game in other ways later. 
The mod does not require Dawnguard in order to work, however, the Falmer Mage armor will lack textures if you dont have Dawnguard installed. 
_________________________________

Bard armor:
Crafting components: 
leather x3
leather strip x3
steel ingot x1
flute x1
tankard x1
[IMG]http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp350/bamsemisbruker/Untitled-1_zps53dbb0ea.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp350/bamsemisbruker/Untitled-1_zps8aba602c.jpg[/IMG]

Shaman robes:
Crafting components: 
Bear pelt x1
Linen wrap x2
Leather x2
Leather strap x2
[IMG]http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp350/bamsemisbruker/shaman_zpsef4b6717.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp350/bamsemisbruker/Untitled-1_zpsb99c2017.jpg[/IMG]

Falmer mage: 
Crafting components: 
Linen wrap x3
Moonstone x2
[IMG]http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp350/bamsemisbruker/falmermage_zps655369fb.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i426.photobucket.com/albums/pp350/bamsemisbruker/Untitled-1_zps422611fd.jpg[/IMG]
_________________________________

Credits:
Fenriks for taking the armors from blender to skyrim. He has actually done most of the work!
Patobek and Omesean for support and inspiration
PiggyNightmare and amnis for screenshots. 
TH3WICK3D1 , L0rd0fWar, Antioch08 and AlphaWoIF for importing the witcher armors to skyrim. 
CD Project Red for making the witcher and allowing us to use the models.
Bethesda for obvious reasons ;)
_________________________________

Version history:
1.0 Initial release
_________________________________

Permissions:
Ask before use. Dont upload anywhere else. It may be translated into other languages.

_________________________________
German version: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33220
author: Luddemann Fenriks
